commit message:
Work in progress: filtering

Do not publish
Make refresh work as expected when a filter is applied

Major search display / filtering update

- hide units unless topic is expanded or they specifically meet the search filter
- make actions on topics more clear
- filtering now correctly matches both topics and units
Super simple help page that just has info about the user's device
allow icons to show in disabled list items
Add the app's version number to the About screen
Fix unit logic to allow for more than 1 card per subtype
Set default font size for cards
Add plugin for custom url scheme handling
Fixes #51. Render images on cards correctly.
Reset to first slide when moving to a new unit

Keep track of units that have been opened, the slide they're on last, and whether the end has been reached

Also, ensure that each unit starts on:
- The first card if it has never been opened
- The most recently-viewed card for that unit if it has been opened
